website_summaries.verdict: This is a two-pack of traction pads that can double as a jack stand when you’re on soft or slippery ground.
pros: Made of heavy-duty nylon, these pads have a 10-ton capacity on level ground
Handles on both ends and either side allow for easy maneuvering and positioning
cons: They don’t come with any kind of storage bag or box

customer_reviews.title: very ductile
customer_reviews.text: I did a test to see if the material was actually ductile. I put the track on a 8" step and left it unsupported below. Then I drove on it. It bent at about 70 degrees which is a lot. When I reversed off the step, it bent right back to flat with only minor damage. This is an extreme test because in the real world I would put dirt or sand underneath to support the track. Now I know I can trust it when I need it because the material is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They worked once
customer_reviews.text: They got me unstuck once but I think that is all they are good for...
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive, but NOT cheap construction!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets for my Ram Power Wagon and Jeep Grand Cherokee. I actually used them in very muddy conditions near the Knik River in Palmer, Alaska today. They worked perfectly and I was able to stack them to teat their bridging capability, which they handled with ease. My only complaint is that one set came with a carry bag, and one set didn’t. The carry bag is a nice touch and I wish I would have received the additional bag. That aside, the product works as advertised and suffered no surface degradation or cracking, I conducted the tests in 34 degree temps in thick mud and rainy conditions. I hope this helps, good wheelin’ everybody!
customer_reviews.author: uawklchgb

customer_reviews.title: Great price and value
customer_reviews.text: I have not gotten a chance to get stuck and try them out, but with that being said they feel very strong with enough flexible. Mounting them on my truck was super easy. Also with being bright green they should be easy to find in the mud (which is a big please). Over all I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully this was just a completely faulty batch
customer_reviews.text: Mostly I bought this to put on my 83K5 Blazer for Looks . used twice in sugar sand and this is the end results
customer_reviews.author: Talldwarf

customer_reviews.title: Must have them when Overlanding
customer_reviews.text: I used it this weekend for my buddy's truck and mine where he and I got stuck in the deep sand. They worked perfectly. One less star for the only one issue I have was, some of the traction thread plastics came off but overall I recommend them and thumbs up for me. Well worth bringing them when I overland.
customer_reviews.author: Norgom

customer_reviews.title: Should make a difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I have a small, rear-drive pickup truck. Last fall I managed to get stuck on a slick incline. These traction devices would have made all the difference in the world and saved me the embarrassment of having to have a friend pull me out. All I needed was enough traction to move me up a short grade and these traction boards should do that very well. On the other hand, if I never have to use them, that would be just fine, too. Either way I will be more comfortable putting up deer stands in the woods this fall.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorT

customer_reviews.title: nice board with jack base features.
customer_reviews.text: overall this traction board works like any other and for a great price. i got it because of the jack base feature. but i do with the boards are better for stacking. it does stack but not to the point where it locks in. i think stack-ability is a proven feature out for off-road use. 1. it helps with stowing the equipment. 2. stack boards can increase strength and height in certain areas.
customer_reviews.author: S. C. Ho

customer_reviews.title: Read all the positive reviews before buying...but my experience was just not good.
customer_reviews.text: First time I used them...one fractured and the other cracked. Was in slushy snow over a National Forest road. Doesn't seem like an extreme situation. pretty average actually. Standard 4wd Toyota Tacoma. Will fork out the big $$ for the Maxtrax.
customer_reviews.author: P. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Worked to get me out of the mud
customer_reviews.text: I got stuck in mud...tires were probably about 6" deep. It took a couple tries to get these wedged under the wheel right, but as soon as I got them positioned right, I was able to back right out of the mud. So they did their job, and I was glad to have them with me. It would be nice if they were a little lighter, but overall, they seem to be a pretty good product--especially considering the are much less expensive than other brands of similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary D. Hilbert

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Broke first use. Poorly designed. The webbing thickness is much too thin for any use besides maybe an atv or similar. Do yourself a favor and avoid these.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great value; perfect for Hi-Lift jack
customer_reviews.text: I paired these recovery tracks with a 48" Hi-Lift jack. The base of the Hi-Lift fit perfectly into the recessed area of the Bunker recovery tracks. Anyone looking for affordable traction mats to match to a proven, high quality jack, look no further. These babies seem very sturdy and look awesome! I will come back and update my review when I use them in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Rommel

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Used in sand. Plastic is thick enough that it can double as a shovel for sand/mud/snow. My tires did rip off some of the plastic treads on first use, but totally reusable and worth not having to winch out. They are long and thick boards, so it would be easy to throw in a truck bed, but tight fit in Wrangler. A sturdy bag to store it in would be a nice addition!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: A bit too long for my taste.
customer_reviews.text: I own a 2016 wrangler jk (2 door) and had to return these because of the size. Even without the back seat, they didnt fit. Too long. They seemed durable and helpful with that hi lift jack stabilizer though.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Gandara

customer_reviews.title: Broke during the first use.
customer_reviews.text: After getting stuck in the snow I attempted to use these to gain a little traction in order to turn myself around. After digging under the wheels and creating a flat area for the boards to lay I backed over them and both boards cracked along the side.
customer_reviews.author: David A

customer_reviews.title: Requires some deburing
customer_reviews.text: The product comes fresh out of the plastic mold with sharp edges. If you have a deburing tool, it is 3 minutes of cutting off the sharp edges. Otherwise, use some sandpaper. It is a useful object and great to carry with you. Not bright orange to attract unwanted attention which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: These boards are great and can flex a great deal without breaking. As far as i can tell, they are pretty much the same as the original name brand for a fraction of the cost. Also, I had a small problem with one of these boards but the seller went above and beyond to make it right. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Option

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: Got someone's Tahoe out of some very slick mud on a steep downhill incline when they were close to going into a pond. They backed up on these with no problem. None of the nubs broke and the boards retained their shape.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without them!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use these much yet, but these saved my jeep and ego from sliding off an icy bank when doing some late night offroad adventures with some friends. I managed to let my ego drive my jeep beyond where my tires had traction. With the aid of my winch and these boards, I was able to get myself back on the road and not let my jeep roll down a very steep hill. Glad I bought these. Maybe the cheapest offroad insurance and accessory you can have while traveling beyond the pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Breazile

customer_reviews.title: Not worth money
customer_reviews.text: Just tore up tread on my mower, didn’t work at all😦
customer_reviews.author: john c

customer_reviews.title: good budget item
customer_reviews.text: they have held up well for what I have needed to use them for. I did test the bridging capacity and they flexed relatively quickly but I won't use them for that anyways
customer_reviews.author: Pohai

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted my favorite color is green and there way better than using my floor mats and not as expensive as the ones everyone else seem to like
customer_reviews.author: scooter

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Seems Well-Built
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used em yet, which is a good thing (haven’t gotten stuck), but I am happy with the quality of the product, the weight and the handles that make it easy to carry. I just wish they made a mounting system for these. Too long to fit in the back of most SUVs/Jeeps. Overall great price for a good product
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Solid, good design and value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transport and use. Not too light or too heavy. Lots of places to connect a small rope or cord to move around and adjust while using and I also use those same points to mount to vehicle to transport.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Comes as described. Confident that it will perform when needed. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: haven't had to use yet but confident will do its job
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Cracked 'em the 1st use BUT I GOT HOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: These cracked in the centers around the hi-lift jack base. they are still usable, just a bit more flexible & slightly compromised. That said I got out of my muddy predicament & slept in my own bed that night.... PRICELESS...
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Better than name brand for the price difference. Works the same and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Braatz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. Used several times and no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Worth their weight in gold
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I am not an overland instagram dork so I don’t need the name brand recovery boards. These work perfect for in mid and deep snow.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J Rossman

customer_reviews.title: Much cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I havent used yet but they seem really strong and much cheaper than the name brand. Even if the wear out faster that's a hard price to beat
customer_reviews.author: Clancyd101

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We used these for our 4runner and we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Great And useful
customer_reviews.text: Worked well when needed. No cracks or broken boards after multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet but seem to be of good quality. Glass fiber plastic so should last. Only problem is they don't stack very well
customer_reviews.author: gtg

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Seem durable, only used once so far, purchased these for the hi lift feature but have not used them for that yet, honestly hopefully i don't lol. So far I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: k king

customer_reviews.title: Great to have around!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it yet. But great to have for dicey situations!
customer_reviews.author: dgd_reviews

customer_reviews.title: Do the job.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I’ve used them to level my Forester for setting up my rooftop tent, as well as traction aids when in a 3wheel situation. No complaints for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good traction pad, VFM
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for off roading, snow extraction. I’ve used it once last weekend to test it. It has good traction patterns. I don’t know it’s durability yet. But it looks pretty solid and elastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent grip
customer_reviews.text: everything and more is what I consider a excellent product. These are it. Like a two for one part with the built in hi -lift jack platform.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Kwiecien

customer_reviews.title: Green Traction Mats
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and Hi vis . Nest together well at 3.5" overall height . Just another off road tool to make life easier !
customer_reviews.author: Bill J

customer_reviews.title: Bigger then expected
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used them yet, but the product feels well built and stored away easy in the bed of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy recovery boards
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had a chance to put them to the test
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Moffitt

product_meta.title: BUNKER INDUST Off-Road Traction Boards with Jack Lift Base, 2 Pcs Recovery Tracks Traction Mat for 4X4 Jeep Mud, Sand, Snow Traction Ladder-Red Tire Traction Tool
feature_bullets: 【Multi-functional Traction Mat】Designed with unique jack base in the center of the traction mat is for emergency work, compatible with all jack.Superior ramp design and unique shovel feature of this traction mat to get you out of the mud, snow, sand or any type of loose terrain

【Get your 4WD out of any Situation】Superior raised tracks give you the maximum traction and prevent vehicle tires from spinning on snow, ice, mud or sand.And jack base can be used with your farm jack. You Can get vehicle unstuck from any situation

【High Quality Traction Boards】Made of super tough engineering-grade reinforced nylon, flexible, lightweight, durable.U-type reinforcement design increase stability and prevent side slip.Easy to clean, anti-corrosion, UV resistance, Ideal for off-road use
【Easy to Carry】Works with any vehicle! Store them in the trunk or on the roof of your vehicle and take them anywhere!4 Comfortable side-handles for easy portability

【Ideal Recovery Tool for Off-road Use】Large size (47.64incn*12.95in) of the traction mat is perfect for all vehicles.Simply place the traction mats under your vehicle's wheels, and help your car to get out of boggy mud, sand, ice, snow

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars125 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
